title: Why am I banned for this? 14 day suspension because of one recorded bad normal match. False ban
body:
I'm not one to usually complain but I just received a 14 day suspension for feeding intentionally which was not the case (1 game). I was playing a norm around 15 games ago with a toxic team and everyone knew it was a loss from the beginning. I died 22 times, had 5 kills and 10 assists, and I just couldn't wait for the game to be over, it was a bad match for sure. I died a bunch but I was trying throughout the match regardless of what the other mates we're saying and how hard I was getting camped. I have been killing it in ranked lately and I was just about to finish promos until that ban just popped out of nowhere. I was obviously reported by the 3 people I was playing with and I want to know if there is anyway I could revoke this ban with riot because it is utterly false and absurd that this just happened because of one horrific match. I consider myself a serious player and I'm striving towards being a professional player. I am not one to feed or troll and I intend to be sportsmanlike all around and my match history shows that. I believe this to be a false ban. I have already sent a ticket but the wait is long, If anyone can help me out with this I'd appreciate it. 

I'd appreciate serious answers, I understand the rules to this game and that 99% of bans are rightfully accused but this one is a no no. I just purchased RP and planned on playing hard tonight with my friends and this happened.

replies.body: If you want more context as to why this ban was placed, you're welcome to reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they can go over what was said in the match that got you banned. I did already look at myself, and it looks like this was placed for the right reasons.
Did it tell you got banned for intentional feeding? Or was it for flame or other stuff
